Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GameTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameTest
public class GameTest
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    GameTest()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void buyTest()
    Tests that the player can successfully buy a card in his turn.
    void buyTest1()
    Tests that the player can't successfully buy a card in his turn if he doesn't have resources.

    Test shows that the first player can't get resources.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameTest

      public GameTest()

  • Method Details

    • creationTest

      @Test public void creationTest()
      Creation test. We are checking if the Game is correctly instantiated, the players are added to the Game and the Game starts without problems.

    • leaderActionTest

      @Test public void leaderActionTest()
      Leader action test. We are checking if the methods activateLeader() and discardLeader() works. We are trying the case when a player wants to activate a leader but it's not his turn or he doesn't have the requirements to activate it, and when he wants to discard a leader and the action goes fine, it is not his turn or he has already discarded both leaders.

    • productionTest

      @Test public void productionTest()
      Production test. We are testing if the method produce() works. We tests the case when the action goes well, when the player already did a mandatory action, when it is not his turn, when he ends the turn correctly and the second player does the same.

    • endgameTest

      @Test public void endgameTest()
      Endgame test. We are testing if the game, once a player reaches the end of the FaithTrack, ends without problems and declaring the right winner.

    • winnerByResTest

      @Test public void winnerByResTest()
      Endgame test with equal points. We are testing if the game, in case two players have the same amount of points, correctly decides which is the winner by counting the resources left in their deposits and strongbox.

    • fromMarket1

      @Test public void fromMarket1()
      lowercasing a map

    • chooseInitialResourceTest1

      @Test public void chooseInitialResourceTest1()
      Test shows that the first player can't get resources. The method will throw an exception and the player's deposit remain empty.

    • chooseInitialResourceTest2

      @Test public void chooseInitialResourceTest2()
      Test shows that the player can't get resources if it isn't his turn. His deposits remain unchanged.

    • chooseInitialResourceTest3

      @Test public void chooseInitialResourceTest3()
      Test shows that all players receive the right amount of resources.

    • swapDepositTest

      @Test public void swapDepositTest()
      Tests that a player can successfully swap his deposits during his turn.

    • swapDepositTest1

      @Test public void swapDepositTest1()
      Tests that a player can't successfully swap his deposits if it is not his turn.

    • buyTest

      @Test public void buyTest()
      Tests that the player can successfully buy a card in his turn.

    • buyTest1

      @Test public void buyTest1()
      Tests that the player can't successfully buy a card in his turn if he doesn't have resources.
